item.title: The first month of ChatGPT
item.description: ChatGPT is the name of a text-generating AI from OpenAI which has the potential to change the world. The AI is good at answering challenging questions. It can also generate programming code for stated tasks and be poetic or philosophical. The most impactful difference to earlier text-generating AI models is its ability to answer follow-up questions, which also allows to sharpen, shorten or reformulate an answer. Everyone, who has tested it, is amazed.
